DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , control trial evaluate analgesic efficacy safety intravenous single-dose paracetamol , dexketoprofen morphine treatment low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: IV Paracetamol , Dexketoprofen Morphine Treatment Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design Setting : This single-center , prospective , randomize , double-blind , clinical trial perform ED tertiary care hospital annual census approximately 37.000 visit . The local ethic committee approve study . Interventions : We conduct randomize , control clinical trial compare single intravenous dos paracetamol ( 1 g ) , dexketoprofen ( 50 mg ) morphine ( 0.1 mg/kg ) patient present emergency department ( ED ) suspect low back pain . Subjects inadequate pain relief 30 minute receive rescue fentanyl ( 0.75 microg/kg ) . We compare change pain intensity 30 minute treatment . Methods Measurements : Subjects report pain intensity 100-mm visual analogue scale ( limited 'no pain ' 'the bad pain ' ) 4-point verbal rating scale ( pain , mild , moderate , severe pain ) drug administration , 15th minute 30th minute study drug administration . The demographic feature study patient adverse effect , nausea , vomit , dizziness , vertigo , headache , hypotension , alter mental status , allergic reaction , itching , urinary retention , thoracic rigidity , respiratory depression dry mouth , record study form . Outcome Measures The primary outcome measure pain reduction VAS VRS 15th 30th minute . Secondary outcome measure need rescue drug presence adverse event . Primary Data Analysis : The present study plan superiority trial . When 20 mm difference VAS accept clinically significant standard deviation accept 25 mm , 35 patient need group 95 % power . All analysis implement accord intention treat analysis . The precise difference time interval within group group statistical significance express 95 % confidence interval ( 95 % CI ) .
DOC.criteria: Adults ( age 16 55 year ) acute low back pain eligible inclusion study Exclusion criterion include know allergy contraindication morphine , paracetamol , dexketoprofen opioid analgesic Hemodynamic instability Fever ( temperature > 38°C [ 100.4°F ] ) Evidence peritoneal inflammation Documented suspect pregnancy Known suspect aortic dissection aneurysm , lombar disc hernia Use analgesic within 6 hour ED presentation Previous study enrollment . Patients know renal , pulmonary , cardiac , hepatic failure , well renal transplantation , also exclude .
